_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:33:32 using v2.0
title: Does feeling supported to manage their long-term condition(s) differ by deprivation?
analysis_commentary:
Information published under the NHS Outcomes Framework also indicates a link between how people feel about being supported and deprivation.

The least deprived patient group felt supported to manage their long-term condition(s) the most (73% in 2013) and the most deprived patient group felt the least supported to manage their long-term condition(s), with a strong correlation between feeling positive about the support received and patient deprivation.
